page.title: 13INDUSTRIES IN MILLBROOK
page.content: There are only two industries in the whole block, IVEX PHARMACEUTICALS and TOPPING MEATS. They are adjacent, in government-owned factories, in Millbrook. {IVEX {ESTABLISHED-}November 1981 {MANAGING DIRECTOR-}Dr Wm Woodside {PRODUCT-}Antiseptic and surgical fluids, (drips & internal feeding supplies) for hospitals all over the world. {EMPLOYEES-}64. Living in Millbrook, Larne, Ballyclare, Lisburn, Belfast, Ballymena. {MATERIALS-}Water (with trace elements of salt, glucose and other chemicals). {WORKING HOURS-}8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (with \ hour lunch break, 15 mins tea break), Monday to Friday. {SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS-}Absolutely sterile conditions.
